PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-03362022-04-05,  ,  ,  GAC,  , 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Belarus) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (BELARUS) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add nine (9) individuals to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of Foreign Affairs; (2) prohibit individuals or entities in Canada from providing insurance, reinsurance, and underwriting services related to Belarusian aircraft, and aviation and aerospace products; and (3) prohibit any person in Canada and any Canadian outside Canada from exporting, selling, supplying or shipping any good to Belarus or to any person in Belarus, if the good is described in the Restricted Goods and Technologies List.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0075 Publication Date: 2022-04-27
AttachmentsAttachment
